cards.title: The Stranger
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card now.
Reveal the top card of a deck, then replace it or discard it.
Up to 2 ongoing hero cards may be played now.

openingLines.default: Rain and shadow will unmake you.
openingLines.Cauldron.DendronCharacter: You know nothing of destruction. I will show you.
openingLines.WindcolorDendronCharacter: Always seeking a new source of power; it will not avail you!
openingLines.HydraWinterTiamatCharacter: This serpent has been scarred by magic, as I have been.

cards.title: Corruption
body: Draw up to 4 cards.
For each card drawn this way, {TheStranger} deals himself 1 toxic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Old magic works its way into{BR}your bones, until eventually they're{BR}not your bones any more.

cards.flavorReference: The Stranger, Roots of the World #40

cards.title: Flickering Web
cards.body: You may play up to 3 Runes now.

flavorQuotes.text: Each rune burns in my mind; they will{BR}not be contained.

cards.title: Glyph of Combustion
body: Once during your turn when {TheStranger} would deal himself damage, prevent that damage.
Whenever a Rune or Glyph is destroyed, {TheStranger} may deal 1 target 1 fire damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Your writing can be a bit{BR}inflammatory.

cards.title: Glyph of Decay
cards.body: Once during your turn when {TheStranger} would deal himself damage, prevent that damage.
powers: You may play a Rune. {TheStranger} deals 1 target 1 toxic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Everything unwritten will be lost to{BR}the mists of time.

cards.flavorReference: The Stranger, The Coming of Winter #8

cards.title: Glyph of Innervation
cards.body: Once during your turn when {TheStranger} would deal himself damage, prevent that damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Within that circle, you play by his{BR}rules.

cards.title: Glyph of Perception
body: Once during your turn when {TheStranger} would deal himself damage, prevent that damage.
When a villain target enters play, you may play a Rune.

cards.title: Mark of Binding
body: Play this next to a non-hero target. Reduce damage dealt by that target by 1.
At the start of your turn you may destroy this card. If you do not, {TheStranger} deals himself 1 irreducible toxic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: How can you break a chain you can't{BR}understand?

cards.title: Mark of Breaking
body: Play this next to a target. Increase damage dealt to that target by 1.
At the start of your turn you may destroy this card. If you do not, {TheStranger} deals himself 1 irreducible toxic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: The slender threads holding you are{BR}snapping, one by one.

cards.title: Mark of Destruction
cards.body: Play this next to a non-character card. If either card is destroyed, destroy the other. Redirect damage dealt to this card by non-hero targets to the hero target with the highest HP.

cards.title: Mark of Quickening
body: Play this next to a hero. They may play an additional card during their play phase.
At the start of your turn you may destroy this card. If you do not, {TheStranger} deals himself 1 irreducible toxic damage.
cards.flavorText: Bunker grinned as the world slowed{BR}around him. “Oh, YEAH.”

cards.title: Mark of the Blood Thorn
body: Play this next to a hero target. The first time that target is dealt damage each turn, it deals 1 target 1 toxic damage.
At the start of your turn you may destroy this card. If you do not, {TheStranger} deals himself 1 irreducible toxic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Do not give your blood freely.

cards.title: Mark of the Bone Leech
body: Play this next to a hero target. The first time that target deals damage each turn, it regains 1 HP.
At the start of your turn you may destroy this card. If you do not, {TheStranger} deals himself 1 irreducible toxic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: There is still life in this place, if not{BR}in these people.

cards.title: Mark of the Faded
body: Play this next to a hero target. When that target would be dealt damage by a non-hero card, you may redirect that damage to a hero with higher HP.
At the start of your turn you may destroy this card. If you do not, {TheStranger} deals himself 1 irreducible toxic damage.

cards.title: Mark of the Twisted Shadow
body: Play this next to a hero target. Increase damage dealt by that target by 1.
At the start of your turn you may destroy this card. If you do not, {TheStranger} deals himself 1 irreducible toxic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: We each carry a void in our wake,{BR}hungry for light.

cards.title: The Old Roads
cards.body: Put a Glyph from your trash into your hand, or reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Glyph, put it into play, and shuffle the other revealed cards into your deck. You may draw a card.

cards.title: Unweave
body: You may shuffle up to 4 Runes from your trash into your deck, or discard up to 4 cards.
For each card shuffled or discarded this way, {TheStranger} may draw a card or regain 1 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: You cannot take a thing apart without{BR}learning about it. Including yourself.

cards.flavorReference: The Scholar, Roots of the World #51

cards.title: Whispered Signs
body: You may draw 2 cards or put a Rune from your trash into your hand.
You may play a Rune or Glyph now.

flavorQuotes.text: The world is written in rain and{BR}shadows.

promoCards.title: The Stranger
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card now.
Destroy 1 hero ongoing, 1 non-hero ongoing, and 1 environment card.
Villain targets may not regain HP until the start of your turn.

openingLines.default: I have come a long way, to witness your defeat.
openingLines.Cauldron.DendronCharacter: I still have time enough to do what is necessary.
openingLines.WindcolorDendronCharacter: Some things are more important than survival.

promoCards.title: The Stranger
powers: The next time {TheStranger} would deal himself damage, redirect it to another target.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may use a power now.
The target with the lowest HP deals itself 1 irreducible toxic damage.

openingLines.default: Your essence will only fuel my runes!
openingLines.WindcolorDendronCharacter: Today my purpose is stopping you.
openingLines.PastTheRamCharacter: I wish that I knew. But I do know what kind YOU are: no regard for the lives of others.
openingLines.HydraWinterTiamatCharacter: I thought dragons were a myth!
openingLines.Cauldron.TheMistressOfFateCharacter: I do not care for her insinuations, but I care less for the idea of staying trapped here. Let us prevail!

promoCards.title: The Stranger
powers: Discard a rune. If you do, {TheStranger} deals 1 target 4 infernal damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card now.
One hero target deals 1 target 1 infernal damage.
Destroy all environment cards. Play the top card of the environment deck.

openingLines.Cauldron.DendronCharacter: The Wasteland is an insidious teacher.
openingLines.HydraWinterTiamatCharacter: Seems Tiamat has some new tricks. So do I.

promoCards.title: The Stranger
powers: {TheStranger} or a target next to a Rune deals 1 target 2 psychic damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card now.
One hero may use a power now.
One target deals itself 1 irreducible toxic damage.

openingLines.default: Flee in terror at my visage!
openingLines.Cauldron.DendronCharacter: Wooo...spoooky. Do you like my new face?
openingLines.WindcolorDendronCharacter: Are you insulting my new face?
openingLines.HydraWinterTiamatCharacter: Quiet, or you'll scare away the crows!
